review: I've been taking Sodium Bicarbonate 650 mg 2 x a day for 7 years now as recommended by my Nephrologist  to alkalanize my urine due to CKD.I stopped taking for 2 weeks due to its unavailability here in KSA and I noticed an increased of my creatinine from 118mmol to 131mmol.

I have been taking two 650mg tablets a day for 14 years for a kidney transplant, as directed by my transplant Doctor for fluid balance. This helps because I need to drink a lot fluids to keep my kidney flushed out. It is helpful for my acid reflux
